name: Pudding Crush Craft
description:
A fantastic match3 bubble breaker game!

Brand new level, brand new boosters and brand new challenges make the wiggly pudding game even more fun.

The player has to pop at least three puddings of the same color to make them disappear.

Breaking more puddings at the same time earns you more points and more coins.

These coins will buy you boosters that can help you to reach the levels goals and clear the playing field.

100 Levels guarantee fun for hours to come!

Enjoy it.
